text: Leo Stadium is a three-sided football stadium in Thanyaburi, Pathum Thani, Thailand, holding 10,114 spectators. It is the home of BG Pathum United of the Thai League 1. Since opened, the ground has been installed with high-quality artificial surface. However, from the season 2018 onward the stadium will be replaced with real grass. left ==References== ==External links== *Stadium information Category:Football venues in Thailand Category:Buildings and structures in Pathum Thani Province
title: Leo Stadium
